item.title: Resources for a Gentle Introduction to Deep Learning
item.description: The Deep Learning (DL) topic is huge! So huge that many people consider it is as a topic separated from the Machine Learning field. I partially agree with that. IMHO, I consider DL more like a very GE...

item.title: Resources for a Gentle Introduction to Machine Learning
item.description: Jurgen has his own list of recommended resources for new members of his lab. Well, we have ours too. Here is a portion of the list for a gentle introduction to Machine Learning for LABSIN new members. [5 min read]. (updated 10/23/2020).
